channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- Authd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- Authd

item.title: CVE-2024-9313|2024-10-03T15:20:43.266Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- authd
item.description: Authd PAM module before version 0.3.5 can allow broker-managed users to impersonate any other user managed by the same broker and perform any PAM operation with it, including authenticating as them.

item.title: CVE-2024-9313|2024-10-03T11:04:00.474Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- authd
item.description: Authd PAM module before version 0.3.5 can allow broker-managed users to impersonate any other user managed by the same broker and perform any PAM operation with it, including authenticating as them.
